content: yardage required for each color will vary based on the temperature in your area when working to gauge each ball of yarn is enough for about 27 row or 27 days corresponding to one temperature range because a temperature blanket is by default 365 row long 1 row per day the length of the blanket will be generous the width of the blanket may be altered as desired keeping in mind this will affect the amount of yarn needed work 1 row per day in the color that corresponds to the day s high temperature miss a day check past temperatures in the us on the accuweather site at https //www accuweather com/
